definition: abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
"speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
Kunlun (Karakorum) mountain range in Xinjiang
to arrange
variant of 崙|仑[lun2]
no matter what or how/regardless of whether...
forum (for discussion)
to discuss/to talk over/CL:個|个[ge4]
theory/CL:個|个[ge4]/to argue/to take notice of
to comment on/to discuss/comment/commentary/CL:篇[pian1]
public opinion
conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
whatever/no matter what (who, how etc)/regardless of/not to discuss
to argue/to debate/to contend/argument/contention/controversy/debate/CL:次[ci4],場|场[chang3]
paper/treatise/thesis/CL:篇[pian1]/to discuss a paper or thesis (old)
expression of opinion/views/remarks/arguments
to prove a point/to expound on/to demonstrate or prove (through argument)/proof
to discuss/to talk about
whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means

sentences.english: However, the present recognition of TV essays still remains on the text-oriented level.
sentences.chinese: 但当前对电视散文的认识仍然停留在文本主导论层次。

sentences.english: The second and the third chapter discuss the Gongan School .
sentences.chinese: 第二章和第三章是流派论。

sentences.english: It can be called as the exposition of surrounding rock reinforcement.
sentences.chinese: 此论述也可称围岩加固论。

sentences.english: First, it inquires into Marx's conception of social development.
sentences.chinese: 首先探讨了马克思的社会发展论。

sentences.english: By the 20th century, views similar to Berkeley's were called phenomenalism.
sentences.chinese: 到20世纪，类似伯克利的观点是所谓的现象论。

sentences.english: The definition of an investment should never be a trade gone awry.
sentences.chinese: 投资不能以一次交易论成败。

sentences.english: The main objection to animalism is that it conflicts with the psychological-continuity view.
sentences.chinese: 对动物论的主要反对是，这和心理连续观点不相容。

sentences.english: Philosophic base is the inner basis and authentic essence of teaching theory.
sentences.chinese: 哲学基础是教学论的内在根据和本真灵魂。

sentences.english: On the Life Aesthetics "Calling for Soul" and "Nine Songs";
sentences.chinese: 论《招魂》《九歌》的生命美学。

sentences.english: It avoids the intellectualism of christian theology .
sentences.chinese: 它回避宗教神学的唯理智论。

sentences.english: We have talked about the Documentary Hypothesis.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经谈过了资料来源假设论。

sentences.english: It's from the argument about self-ownership.
sentences.chinese: 而是来源于自我拥有论的观点。

sentences.english: Let's try to refine the personality theory.
sentences.chinese: 让我们给人格论重新定义一下。

sentences.english: The map theory has at least two advantages over the Picture theory.
sentences.chinese: 相对于图像论而言，语言地图说至少有两个优点。

sentences.english: Then the theory of TBSC and TBBC curves and surfaces are discussed in details.
sentences.chinese: BSC曲线曲面论，这是本文的重点内容之一。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter is to discuss the reception of ChuCi in Liu Xizai' poem–ode.
sentences.chinese: 第五章，论刘熙载诗赋对楚辞的接受。

definition: to make reference to/to write about
whatever/no matter what (who, how etc)/regardless of/not to discuss
to excel/to surpass
no matter what or how/regardless of whether...
not to mention/leaving aside
indeed/true! (I agree with you)
to be honest, ...
from this, it can be seen that...
not to be concerned/regardless of/no matter
as for/as to/to go so far as to
to discuss two disparate things together (idiom); to mention on equal terms/to place on a par with/(often with negatives: impossible to mention X in the same breath as Y)
not equal to/not as good as/inferior to/it would be better to
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
surname Tan
in short/in a word/in brief
serious mistake/major demerit
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute
